dict.acceptation: 痕迹；记号；（品质或情感的）标志；目标；
作记号；表示；给…打分；在…留下痕迹；

sent.orig: Hi, is Fanny in, Uncle Mark?
Mark: And what are these higher levels James?
sent.trans: Mark:James,这些更高的层次是什么？

sent.orig: Vicki: A dry martini, please. You can call me Vanessa. May I call you Mark?
sent.trans: 我要一杯干马提尼酒，谢谢。你可以叫我Vanessa.我可以叫你Mark吗？

sent.orig: Mark: So what is the activation then?
Vicki: That's music to my ears, Mark. Looks like we can do business together. Cheers!
sent.trans: 听起来很不错，Mark.看来我们可以合作。干杯！
